title: लोकसभा चुनाव के बाद ईवीएम के खिलाफ विरोध प्रदर्शन के रूप में पुरानी तस्वीरें प्रसारित

vclaim: Breaking : In Surat Public Started Protests Against #EVM Without Any Politician Or Political Support & The Bootlicker Media Isn’t Showing This On Any News Channels The Public Is On Streets Seems This Will Be The Start Against Weakening Of Indian Democracy& #EVMHacking#RT Spread pic.twitter.com/u1VHXQyeZ4
